casebody.data:
WASHINGTON MUTUAL BANK
v.
Linda S. COUGHLIN et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 15, 2016

Daniel F. Coughlin, self-represented, and Linda S. Coughlin, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Peter R. Meggers and Brian D. Rich, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn.App. 278, 145 A.3d 408 (2016), is denied.
